page.title: 09HOME LIFE-BOGNOR REGIS
page.content: Week days begin with Daddy preparing the breakfast of toast and marmalade for the family, before going to work in Horticulture. He takes me to school at 0845.My Mummy does the housework, washing and shopping and looks after my baby sister.On two evenings a week I go to gymnastics and brownies.Daddy plays with us in the evenings then he does gardening or sleeps in front of the television.On Sundays Mummy makes the breakfast then she washes and dresses my baby sister before we both play with my friend who lives opposite.Mummy cooks the lunch which is usually chicken.Daddy takes Grandma to church.After lunch we all go to Appledram stables where I go horse riding.Later we visit our cousins,go walking,or sometimes we have a picnic.
